column4: what is the best tool to manage an iPod Nano? the default ones seem to corrupt the itunes DB
tried that, it killed my itunesdb
any ideas on why now my iPod cant find any other music?
I have no idea what you mean? find music?
i can see the songs from amarok and banshee, but not from my iPod
When you switch to gtkpod its best to totally start from scratch the itunes db and all.
how do i reset the itunes db from iPod?
format it. Itll recreate the whole file system when the ipod restarts.
no idea. I usually just use gparted
or you can browse to it in nautilus and throw everything away in it.
k, thanks.. I'll give it a try
now lets see what gtkpod says
